innerHTML=False, container="div", scripting=True, **kwargs
    ):

        #
        # https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/scripting.html#the-noscript-element
        #
        # Override HTMLParser so we can swap out the tokenizer for our own.
        self.innerHTMLMode = innerHTML
        self.container = container
        self.scripting = scripting
        self.tokenizer = BleachHTMLTokenizer(
            stream=stream, consume_entities=self.consume_entities, parser=self, **kwargs
        )
        self.reset()

        try:
            self.mainLoop()
        except ReparseException:
            self.reset()
            self.mainLoop()

findings.title: Potential sql injection detected

cursor.execute(
                "SET SESSION CHARACTERISTICS AS TRANSACTION %s"
                % ("READ ONLY" if value else "READ WRITE")

findings.title: Potential sql injection detected
findings.evidence:
cursor.execute(
                "SET SESSION CHARACTERISTICS AS TRANSACTION %s"
                % ("DEFERRABLE" if value else "NOT DEFERRABLE")
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries or ORM methods

findings.title: Potential sql injection detected
findings.evidence:
cursor.execute(
                    self._opt_encode(
                        "SET IDENTITY_INSERT %s OFF"
                        % self.identifier_preparer.format_table(
                            self.compiled.compile_state.dml_table
                        )
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries or ORM methods
